TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Cung-ku-an-huy_takuliyaway_a_buyu’, title = Cung-ku-an-huy_takuliyaway_a_buyu’, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cung-ku-an-huy_takuliyaway_a_buyu’} }

S.FORM: 中國安徽省黃山 Cung-ku-an-huy takuliyaway a buyu'takuliyaway a buyu' itini I cung-ku nu an-huy, i nu timilan, u timul atua mis u tanayu' nida makaala tu sipsep ku-ki katanayu', u amisan atu tipan nu ahebal sa lusep a ku-li ku ahebal, u buyu' nu ahebal caytu malebut ku ku-li u tatelunagan nuytiniay a baetu sa u huwa-kang-in ani kasa kaku, satalakaway i lin-huwa a tunguduh nu buyu'buyu'an. takuliyaway a buyu, nu sayaway a ngangan sa kapahay a kitidaan, u aalaan tu sapilacul, u sibalucu'ay hidan u sipayaay ku patahekal tu ngangan . nayi 1982 a mihcaan maala nu sayaway maala nu kanatal tatelungan nu aidangan ; 1986 a mihcaan talukiyawaw a buyu' mala nu cung-ku caysep a aaidanga nu cacay, u cung-ku caysep nu masacacayay u buyu'buyu'an aaidangan, 1990 amihcaan 12abulad u takuliyaway a buyu' aaidangan sa mala nuytiniay a lalangawan atu celak sananay tu a nisubelid nu paudipay a zaysang kyu maala tu pulung nu kanatal sapasubana' a masakaputay mapacumud I kitakit nu masubeliday a zaysang, i 2004 amihcaan micumud tu kitakit u kapahay a lala nu aaidangan. 2015 amihcaan mala nu kitakit tahekal sananay a sasokulan a mapulungay nu sayaway a sakapahay hekal sananay a sasililan tu sumilaway a kakitidaan. naemekan歷史 huwang-san nu sumamad u yi-san han. idaw ku patucek misulit, u kakawsan nu cung-hu-wa-min-cu ci huwang-ti mukelid tu sitangahay a tademaw ci zung-ce-ce,hu-ciw-kung tayni tini i lin-tan, sadikuday sa kanamuhan nu paudipat mu tapabaw namin . takuliyaway a buyu pangangan han tu nubuyu nanum a kakakulitan nu sapinanuy. yu sumamad nu dikud nu min-mu nuayawan nu cin-mala nu takuliyaway a sapikulitan nu takuliyaway ku sapacuked nu sapikulit, neknek sa i takuliyaway, maybalucu ku sapitanam tu tatengaay a nukulitan, matucek kunipikulit tu takuliyaway a wayway nu aaidangan itini. u situngusay mala sisikiningay a tademaw ci may-cin se-taw cin-ciyang u singanganay kuheni tu namikulitay tu takuliyaway a lu nu sakasenengan a tademaw . ci se-taw hananay a tademaw sayaway cinida ya takuliyaway a buyu' pictu a katatibay nu buyubuyu'an mamin kulitan nida . dumasa u huwang-pi-hung udip ku patinekuay "takuliyawa a buyu' nu buyu'ay atademaw". nu mukasi katukuh ayda katuuday a misulitay a tademaw yadahtu kunisulitan nu heni tu sakay takuliyaway a patineku , itini i takuliyaway a buyu' mamin ku mu-yay a baetu sulitan mahida u takuliyawaw a buyu' idaw ku lalangawan . aaidanga景區 mikacaw tu liw-lung paengaw tu sin-ciyaw-sa-yi a katadungduh nu buyubuyu'an nu kasienawan katahekalan nu cilal ina takuliyaway a buyubuyu'an sa idaw ku kuwanay a wiy-yub-huy, umikuwanay nu cu-zen wiytiniay a se-cang ku satungusay a mikuwan. u ahebal sa 160.6 a pin-huwang-kuli, matatulaka tu unsing ladem nu buyu' ,katatihepa nu buyu', amisan a bayu' ,u kilakilangan, sangaw, minabaway a sauwac, u kalalikeluh a banaw, u hu-ku a siw nu mikuwanay, atu takuliyaway a buyubuyu'an micapi tu limaay a tukay atu cacay ku kitidaan " takuliyawa a kitidaan tang-ku-cen, tan -ciya-ciyaw ce, san-ku- cen, keng-cen-cen, ciyaw-cun-cen, atu yang-hu-lin-cang".面積約160.6 . tini idaw ku limsep ku-li tanayu'ay a caculilan, sapadadan tu midangay atu mikuliay sapaculil tu henian a micaliway. u maminay aaidangan sa atu kitidaan mabi' atu sapalabang sa lalabinan sat u labang, katuuday a midangay sa u culil tabuyu', alahican katukuh nuycuwaan a katatihepa nu buyubuyu'an milabin muhalhal tu nikatahekal nu kanihalan, saka tu ademiad sa duma tu adadan tasasa. u takuliyaway a buyu' mala nu cung-ku nu kanatal aaidangan mala saka 5A a katatibay nu aaidangan nu kitidaan. 5A級旅遊景區. u mikuwanay sisikining amusikul tu aaidangan, mitadasmikiyaku, misakapah a miliyung . mikuwanay namakayni nu kin-sihu misulul apatideng tu hulic sapikuwan a masakaputay, u masakaputay kaph micukaymas tu nu hulic sapibaking . namakayni I takuliyaway a aidangan 2018 amihcaan 11 a bulad pakatineng "takuliyaway a aaidangan tayniay midang u wayway idaw ku sapikuwan nu hulic" u midanga nu tayniay a labang sa idaw kuni pikuwan tu sumanahay lumeniay a hulic, ngy idaw ku sapikuwan tu wayway nu tayniay a labang. . anu mala lumeniay tu a labang sa, a papulungen tu "takuliyaway u cayay kanamuhi a tademaw", pataydan icalacay "pakatineng tu katuuday" "公審".

中國安徽省黃山 Cong-ko-an-hoy takoliyaway a boyo'takoliyaway a boyo' itini I cong-ko no an-hoy, i no timilan, o timol atoa mis o tanayo' nida makaala to sipsep ko-ki katanayo', o amisan ato tipan no ahebal sa losep a ko-li ko ahebal, o boyo' no ahebal cayto malebot ko ko-li o tatelonagan noytiniay a baeto sa o howa-kang-in ani kasa kako, satalakaway i lin-howa a tongodoh no boyo'boyo'an. takoliyaway a boyo, no sayaway a ngangan sa kapahay a kitidaan, o aalaan to sapilacol, o sibaloco'ay hidan o sipayaay ko patahekal to ngangan . nayi 1982 a mihcaan maala no sayaway maala no kanatal tatelongan no aidangan ; 1986 a mihcaan talokiyawaw a boyo' mala no cong-ko caysep a aaidanga no cacay, o cong-ko caysep no masacacayay o boyo'boyo'an aaidangan, 1990 amihcaan 12abolad o takoliyaway a boyo' aaidangan sa mala noytiniay a lalangawan ato celak sananay to a nisobelid no paodipay a zaysang kyo maala to polong no kanatal sapasobana' a masakapotay mapacomod I kitakit no masobeliday a zaysang, i 2004 amihcaan micomod to kitakit o kapahay a lala no aaidangan. 2015 amihcaan mala no kitakit tahekal sananay a sasokolan a mapolongay no sayaway a sakapahay hekal sananay a sasililan to somilaway a kakitidaan. naemekan歷史 howang-san no somamad o yi-san han. idaw ko patocek misolit, o kakawsan no cong-ho-wa-min-co ci howang-ti mokelid to sitangahay a tademaw ci zong-ce-ce,ho-ciw-kong tayni tini i lin-tan, sadikoday sa kanamohan no paodipat mo tapabaw namin . takoliyaway a boyo pangangan han to noboyo nanom a kakakolitan no sapinanoy. yo somamad no dikod no min-mo noayawan no cin-mala no takoliyaway a sapikolitan no takoliyaway ko sapacoked no sapikolit, neknek sa i takoliyaway, maybaloco ko sapitanam to tatengaay a nokolitan, matocek konipikolit to takoliyaway a wayway no aaidangan itini. o sitongosay mala sisikiningay a tademaw ci may-cin se-taw cin-ciyang o singanganay koheni to namikolitay to takoliyaway a lo no sakasenengan a tademaw . ci se-taw hananay a tademaw sayaway cinida ya takoliyaway a boyo' picto a katatibay no boyoboyo'an mamin kolitan nida . domasa o howang-pi-hong odip ko patinekoay "takoliyawa a boyo' no boyo'ay atademaw". no mokasi katokoh ayda katooday a misolitay a tademaw yadahto konisolitan no heni to sakay takoliyaway a patineko , itini i takoliyaway a boyo' mamin ko mo-yay a baeto solitan mahida o takoliyawaw a boyo' idaw ko lalangawan . aaidanga景區 mikacaw to liw-long paengaw to sin-ciyaw-sa-yi a katadongdoh no boyoboyo'an no kasienawan katahekalan no cilal ina takoliyaway a boyoboyo'an sa idaw ko kowanay a wiy-yob-hoy, omikowanay no co-zen wiytiniay a se-cang ko satongosay a mikowan. o ahebal sa 160.6 a pin-howang-koli, matatolaka to onsing ladem no boyo' ,katatihepa no boyo', amisan a bayo' ,o kilakilangan, sangaw, minabaway a saowac, o kalalikeloh a banaw, o ho-ko a siw no mikowanay, ato takoliyaway a boyoboyo'an micapi to limaay a tokay ato cacay ko kitidaan " takoliyawa a kitidaan tang-ko-cen, tan -ciya-ciyaw ce, san-ko- cen, keng-cen-cen, ciyaw-con-cen, ato yang-ho-lin-cang".面積約160.6 . tini idaw ko limsep ko-li tanayo'ay a cacolilan, sapadadan to midangay ato mikoliay sapacolil to henian a micaliway. o maminay aaidangan sa ato kitidaan mabi' ato sapalabang sa lalabinan sat o labang, katooday a midangay sa o colil taboyo', alahican katokoh noycowaan a katatihepa no boyoboyo'an milabin mohalhal to nikatahekal no kanihalan, saka to ademiad sa doma to adadan tasasa. o takoliyaway a boyo' mala no cong-ko no kanatal aaidangan mala saka 5A a katatibay no aaidangan no kitidaan. 5A級旅遊景區. o mikowanay sisikining amosikol to aaidangan, mitadasmikiyako, misakapah a miliyong . mikowanay namakayni no kin-siho misolol apatideng to holic sapikowan a masakapotay, o masakapotay kaph micokaymas to no holic sapibaking . namakayni I takoliyaway a aidangan 2018 amihcaan 11 a bolad pakatineng "takoliyaway a aaidangan tayniay midang o wayway idaw ko sapikowan no holic" o midanga no tayniay a labang sa idaw koni pikowan to somanahay lomeniay a holic, ngy idaw ko sapikowan to wayway no tayniay a labang. . ano mala lomeniay to a labang sa, a papolongen to "takoliyaway o cayay kanamohi a tademaw", pataydan icalacay "pakatineng to katooday" "公審".
